post.title: AILLM limitations in content moderation pose risks
post.excerpt: A recent study by Microsoft has assessed various occupations for their applicability to artificial intelligence, identifying which roles may be at risk of automation and which are expected to remain stable. The findings suggest that jobs heavily reliant on knowledge work are more susceptible to AI replacement, while blue-collar roles are less likely to be affected. https://gizmodo.com/?p=2000637340
